REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2137 reute r f BC-GRUMMAN-<GQ>-UNIT-WIN 04-01 0066

TEXT.TITLE: GRUMMAN <GQ> UNIT WINS MCDONNELL DOUGLAS ORDER
TEXT.BODY: McDonnell Douglas Corp <MD> said it awarded a contract valued at 28 mln dlrs to a unit of Grumman Corp to develop flight control surfaces for the new U.S. Air Force C-17 transport. Grumman Aerostructures of Bethpage, N.Y., will design, develop and build the rudders, elevators and other parts for the transports. Reuter
